meanings.sent1: She dared to jump off the swing.
meanings.sent2: He finally dared to ask her to the dance.
meanings.sent3: The cat dared to climb the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: The sun dared to peek through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The little bird dared to sing in the storm.

meanings.definition: Challenged someone to do something dangerous or difficult.
meanings.sent1: The boys dared each other to swim across the cold lake.
meanings.sent2: She dared her friend to try the spicy chili.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel dared the dog to catch him.
meanings.sent4: The wind dared the tree to sway in its strong gusts.
meanings.sent5: The mountain dared the climbers to reach its peak.

meanings.definition: Had the courage to do something.
meanings.sent1: He dared to speak up against the injustice.
meanings.sent2: She dared to try the new roller coaster.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit dared to challenge the tortoise to a race.
meanings.sent4: The flower dared to bloom in the harsh winter.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter dared to enter the burning building to save the cat.
